text: Niscaya nai unako varnanama bud'dhimanaharuko lagi siksa ra sujhava chan. Yo kura'ana jhutho bana'eko kuro ho'ina. Baru yo pramanita gardacha, ti pustakaharuko juna yasabhanda agadika chan. Ra khullarupama bayana garnevala cha hareka vastuko, ra imanadara mancheharuko lagi nirdesana ra rahamata cha
